name: Lost in the Dance
description:
Sometimes finding out who you really are can be a pleasant experience, let's hope this is one of those times.

Find out who you are and about your past by exploring the situation you find yourself in.

Come along on a new narrative adventure.

"E" or click to interact.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Playtime is about 15-20 minutes.

This was my entry for Ludum Dare #37. 'Lost in the Dance' was made in 72 hours from December 9th to the 12th

The game is a exploration of the ideas of identity and narrative authority.
